nodes.text: Paos Adina was a scavenger on the desert planet Jakku who died due to the planet's heat sometime prior to the First Order's attack on the village of Tuanul, in the year 34 ABY. The scavenger Rey included Adina's name along with those of Turgot Mynes and Binz Scoty in a list of scavengers who had messed up and died from Jakku's heat in a survival guide she compiled, in which she also vowed to not meet the same fate.
Paos Adina was first mentioned in the replica journal Rey's Survival Guide, which was written by Jason Fry and released in 2015.
